effect_entries.effect:
For five turns, heals all Pokémon on the ground for 1/16 their max HP each turn and strengthens their grass moves to 1.5× their power.

Changes nature power to energy ball.
effect_entries.short_effect: For five turns, heals all Pokémon on the ground for 1/16 max HP each turn and strengthens their grass moves to 1.5× their power.

flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user turns the ground to grass for five turns.
This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a
little every turn and powers up Grass-type moves.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire:
The user turns the ground under everyone’s feet
to grass for five turns. This restores the HP of
Pokémon on the ground a little every turn.
flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
